word:
The promises of God are full and abundant, and there is no need for any one to depend upon humanity for strength. To all that call upon him, God is near to help and succor. And he is greatly dishonored, when, after inviting our confidence, we turn from him,--the only one who will not misunderstand us, the only one who can 


                    - 46 - 

give unerring counsel,--to men who in their human weakness are liable to lead us astray.
